remarks: Lemma for ~ cdlemkfid3N .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jul-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdlemk5.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemk5.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemk5.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemk5.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemk5.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemk5.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemk5.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemk5.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemkfid1N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ F =/= ( _I |` B ) /\ G e. T ) /\ ( ( R ` G ) =/= ( R ` F ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ ( R ` G ) ) ./\ ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( R ` ( G o. `' F ) ) ) ) = ( G ` P ) ) $.
